text: The 1926 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles was the first edition of the men's doubles championship. Roland Jacobi and Daniel Pecsi defeated Zoltán Mechlovits and Béla von Kehrling in the final by three sets to one. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== -
title: 1926 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles
